notes: First release! Use command + shift + v to toggle the window. Use up and down arrows to change selection. Use enter to paste the text where the cursor is.
Pretty icons! Now the status bar icon menu has some more features. The location of the Yippy window can be customized to left, right, top and bottom.

Improved the user's experience by making it easier to install Yippy and get it up and running. This is done through guiding the user through providing Yippy full control and explaining why it is necessary. Then instructions for how to use Yippy are provided once the user has provided Yippy full control.

Improved Yippy window framing for all combinations and changing of the menu bar and dock visibility. Added hotkeys to move the Yippy window. Added hotkeys to paste recent items in history. Added option to delete items from history. Added option to clear all history. Fixed bug of item cell height when new items are copied. Fixed other minor bugs.

Major release! Breaking change to improve performance and add new features. New features:
 - Large floating preview to see each item in its entirety.
 - Supporting new types of copies, such as images, files and formatted text.
 - Dark mode support.
 - OSX 10.13.x support.
Added drag paste items and fixed a few bugs.
Fixed bug: font unavailability causing launch crash.
Fixed bug: incorrect Yippy window position when dock permanently shown.
Fixed bug with not showing PNG images. Added 3 sizes of centred Yippy window options. Added ability to customise the toggle hotkey. Changed HotKey dependency to @mattDavo fork using SPM.
